title: Once Trust Is Broken, It Can’t Be Regained – No Matter What You Say Now, It Won’t Affect Me - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Psychological   School Life   Seinen   Tragedy
tags: Amnesia   Apathetic Protagonist   Betrayal   Childhood Friends   Cold Protagonist   Dark   Distrustful Protagonist   Loner Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Past Trauma   Philosophical   Twisted Personality
author: 'Fuyuya Hino   日野　冬夜
description:
It takes time to build trust, but only a moment to break it.

One day, Renya Tsukuyomi is accused of mol*sting a girl on his way home from club activities. Renya, who didn’t actually do it, thinks that the misunderstanding will be cleared up soon. However, the police, his family, friends, and club mates all refused to believe him.

Even his childhood friends who he had known them for over ten years….

And so, Renya stopped believing in people.

But after a while, it became clear that the mol*ster was falsely accused.

Many people came to apologize, but no matter what they said now, it didn’t touch Renya’s heart…>
